M.A. Raza
dcterms:description: The dataset comprises medical records of 299 patients who suffered heart failure, collected from April to December 2015. It includes 7 numerical and 5 nominal features along with one binary target feature indicating the death event, with an imbalance in the target feature.
dcterms:title: Heart Failure Survival dataset
